title: $:/litClock/times/-16:42-Haruki Murakami
quote_first: I’m always happy when I reach the finish line of a long-distance race, but this time it really struck me hard. I pumped my right fist into the air. The time was
quote_last: Eleven hours and forty-two minutes since the start of the race.
quoteSourceTitle: What I Talk About When I Talk About Running
